name: Circle Walking
description: Master the core footwork pattern of Baguazhang to improve agility, balance, and energy flow.

cards.title: Basic Circle Walk
cards.description: A foundational technique for moving fluidly around an opponent while maintaining a defensive posture.
bulletpoints: Keep your posture upright and relaxed
Step with the heel first and roll onto the toes

cards.title: Direction Change Drill
cards.description: Learn how to shift directions smoothly while maintaining balance and fluidity.
bulletpoints: Pivot on the ball of your foot to change direction
Keep upper body steady while transitioning
Use coordinated breathing to maintain stability
